name: Frantic Space
description:
Frantic Space is a 2020 GMTK Game Jam Game. You must embark/disembark your ship and remove space pirates to protect the space creatures.

STORY

You are a man immersed in the universe. Recently, the illegal poaching of space pirates is a problem. You could not watch the destruction of your beloved universe ecosystem. So you... decided to kill the space pirates.

Game Goal

Protect the creatures being poached by space pirates. If you keep them, they will quickly recover and reproduce. You lose if two or more species become extinct! (Or if you die) As you endure increasingly aggressive attacks, legendary creatures emerge. Defend the last invasion to win!

GUIDE

Arrow Key: Move

Z Key: Attack (If you're outside of the ship)

X Key: Embark/Disemark

C Key: Granade (If you have)
